mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, content, regiId, regiDate, login_loginNo, categoryboard_categoryId, subCategoryId) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{regiId}, NOW(), #{login_loginNo}, #{categoryId}, #{subCategoryId})
mapper.select: SELECT b.boardNo AS boardNo, b.title AS title, b.content AS content, b.regiId AS regiId, b.regiDate AS regiDate, b.readcnt AS readcnt, b.login_loginNo AS loginLoginNo, b.categoryboard_categoryId AS categoryId, b.subCategoryId AS subCategoryId FROM board b JOIN board_like bl ON b.boardNo = bl.board_boardNo WHERE b.categoryboard_categoryId = #{categoryId} AND bl.likeCount >= 3 ORDER BY b.regiDate DESC
